attributes.action: Companies and Wealthy people MUST PAY THEIR FAIR SHARE OF TAX
attributes.additional_details:
We call upon the Government to either bring forward a bill or implement a procedure within one year to ensure that where it can be reasonably shown, that wealthy people or companies are not paying their fair share by the use of aggressive tax avoidance schemes.   HMRC has the power to recover the unpaid Tax and apply substantial penalties

We also call for the Government to  publish the full Tax returns of all companies
